scripts.deploy: gcloud run deploy e-wall3t-api   --image europe-west8-docker.pkg.dev/e-wall3t/e-wall3t-api/e-wall3t-api:latest   --region europe-west8   --platform managed   --allow-unauthenticated   --service-account master-api@e-wall3t.iam.gserviceaccount.com   --set-env-vars DRIVE_FOLDER_ID=1cGXaqIYkEYuMNyo4yCsyPRrfwrK8zi6T   --set-env-vars API_KEY=lFs45R9s3A98sSre2zP9   --set-env-vars GCS_BUCKET=e-wall3t-db   --set-env-vars CORS_ORIGIN=*
